name: V.3
description:
DETAILS:

dimensions:
approximately 20" W x 20" D x 30" H (as shown). Size can be customized to your specification.

finish options: 
available in satin brass, polished nickel and satin nickel finish

sockets: 
medium base E-26 lamp socket. UL listed

bulbs:
(3) 40 watt 120V quad loop filament edison style bulbs are included with purchase

bulb wattage: 
maximum wattage per bulb is 60 watt. 

Please consult with licensed electrician if you are not familiar with installing a light fixture.

- The light fixtures are hand made to order so please allow for a lead time of 4-6 weeks from date of purchase.

- Three 40 watt 'quad loop filament' edison style bulbs, one 5" canopy with satin brass finish, and 4" crossbar with mounting hardware included in the price.

- Custom designs are very much encouraged and require a 50% down payment to begin design process. Please allow for a lead time of a minimum of 4-8 weeks for design, mock up, testing, and fabrication.

PLEASE NOTE:

- Uncoated brass will tarnish over time, will get darker, duller and richer with time. A polishing cloth or polishing compound can be used to restore its shine and are typically available at most hardware stores.

- Please note our fixtures are NOT UL listed but we take great pride in crafting the finest quality and safest products. All are fixtures are handmade using only UL rated products and components. They are tested and inspected prior to shipping. It is the customers responsibility to check with a building contractor or local electrical inspector for approval before ordering. 

- studioPGRB LLC is not Liable for any damages caused by misuse of these products.

name: priti
description:
'Priti'- pendant light fixture 

Priti simply translates to 'love'

'Diwali' collection

Inspired by Diwali the Indian 'festival of lights' these light fixtures are hand made of solid unfinished brass parts and designed to be part sculptural, part structural, excitedly modern and visually enhanced with low wattage vintage style bulbs that provide a warm glow reminiscent of the candles lit during the festival.

Diwali the Indian 'festival of lights' which involves the lighting of small clay lamps filled with oil to signify the triumph of good over evil. These lamps are kept on throughout the night to make the goddess Lakshmi feel welcome.



DETAILS:

- 30" W x 30" D x 25.5" H(with 16" stem and bulbs)

- comes with a 6'-0" long twisted cloth wrap wire.

- Maximum wattage per bulb is 40 watt.

Please consult with licensed electrician if you are not familiar with installing a light fixture.

- Also available as a plug in fixture (hang from ceiling with hook, plug into wall outlet) please specify desired length of cord.

- The light fixtures are handmade to order so please allow for a lead time of 4-6 weeks from date of purchase. 

- Three 30 watt Edison style vintage bulbs, 6'-0" long round fabric wrapped cord, and unfinished solid brass 5" canopy with mounting hardware are included in the price.

- Custom designs are very much encouraged and require a 50% down payment to begin design process. Please allow for a lead time of a minimum of 4-8 weeks for design, mock up, testing, and fabrication.


Wholesale prices available please contact us for terms and pricing.

PLEASE NOTE:

- Uncoated brass will tarnish over time, will get darker, duller and richer with time. A polishing cloth or polishing compound can be used to restore its shine and are typically available at most hardware stores.

- Please not our fixtures are NOT UL listed but we take great pride in crafting the finest quality and safest products. All are fixtures are handmade using only UL rated products and components. They are tested and inspected prior to shipping. It is the customers responsibility to check with a building contractor or local electrical inspector for approval before ordering. 

- studioPGRB LLC is not Liable for any damages caused by misuse of these products.
